document.docTitle: Arboridia (Arborifera) changlingensis Jiang & Luo & Song 2021, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: Two new species of the genus Arboridia Zachvatkin from China (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae)

Arboridia ( Arborifera ) changlingensis
sp. nov. 27

paragraph.materialsCitation:

Changlingpo Forest Park
,
27 VI 2020
, coll. Jia Jiang and Xiaowei Yuan.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks. This new species is similar to
Arboridia surstyli Cai & Xu, 2006
, but differs in having the aedeagus with pair of small hilly processes on the dorsal side instead of sharp inverted processes ( Figs 32, 33 ), and the central lobe of connective absent ( Fig. 34 ).
Etymology. The new species is named after its type locality: “Changlingpo” Forest Park, Guizhou Province , China .
